devdoc.details: This factory handles the complete lifecycle of basket creation:      1. Creates the basket in BasketRegistry      2. Deploys an EquiBasketToken for the basket      3. Sets the vault as the token minter      4. Registers the token in the BasketVault       This ensures users never encounter "BasketTokenNotRegistered" errors      because the token is always created and registered atomically.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params._basketVault: Address of the BasketVault (can be set later)
params._defaultSwapFeeBps: Default swap fee for pools in basis points (max 1000 = 10%)

createBasketWithToken(string[],uint256[].details: This function:      1. Creates the basket in registry      2. Deploys a new EquiBasketToken      3. Sets vault as the token minter      4. Registers token in vault      5. Deploys a BasketLiquidityPool for the token      6. Transfers ownership of token and pool to creator

params.name: Human-readable name for the basket
params.weights: Array of weights in basis points (must sum to 10000)

returns.basketId: The unique ID assigned to the new basket
returns.poolAddress: The address of the deployed BasketLiquidityPool
returns.tokenAddress: The address of the deployed EquiBasketToken

returns._0: The pool address (zero if not created via factory)
The token address (zero if not created via factory)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BasketFactory

basketPools(uint256).notice: Mapping from basketId to its liquidity pool address

basketTokens(uint256).notice: Mapping from basketId to its token address

constructor.notice: Deploy the factory with required dependencies

createBasketWithToken(string[],uint256[].notice: Create a complete basket with token and liquidity pool in a single transaction

defaultSwapFeeBps().notice: Default swap fee for new pools in basis points (e.g., 30 = 0.30%)

getBasketPool(uint256).notice: Get the liquidity pool address for a basket

getBasketToken(uint256).notice: Get the token address for a basket

setDefaultSwapFee(uint256).notice: Set the default swap fee for new pools

setVault(address).notice: Set or update the vault address

userdoc.notice: Factory for creating complete basket setups in a single transaction
